__TOC__

* Contact: ActiuInformatica
* Brand: Hundyx
* Model: W765TUN
* Product website: http://www.hundyx.net/Producto/Configuradores/Hundyx%20W765TUN.html

=== Pending issues ===

* In this particular case we have removed the videocamera, but the manufacturer normally includes a "BisonCam NB Pro" maybe with the same problems as in <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LaptopTestingTeam/HundyxW765S|W765S]]</nowiki> model.
* Once cleanly installed (any Ubuntu 8.04, 8.10, 9.04, 9.10, 10.04 // Desktop, Alternate all variants), GRUB doesn't boot (see <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=8785014|forum thread and LiLo solution]]</nowiki>)

=== (*) Notes and recipes ===

==== Correct resolution/refresh ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.04 (Hardy Heron): 800x600

==== Graphic acceleration ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 9.10 (Karmic Koala): Reached with 32-bit Live-CD (nvidia restricted driver), but "Hardware drivers" utility freezes in the 64-bit Live-CD.

==== Compiz/Beryl work ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 9.10 (Karmic Koala): Reached with 32-bit Live-CD (nvidia restricted driver), but "Hardware drivers" utility freezes in the 64-bit Live-CD.

==== Blank monitor when closing lid ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 9.10 (Karmic Koala): Also suspends.

==== Suspends ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 9.10 (Karmic Koala): Trying it with a Live-CD session, then doesn't wake up.

==== Live-CD is functional/practicable ====
* Ubuntu GNU/Linux 8.04 (Hardy Heron): Because of the low resolution.
